website_summaries.verdict: The replaceable inner mesh is a big plus for owners of this skimmer, who also find it durable and good for nabbing leaves and other pool surface debris.
pros: Owners like that the skimmer net can be removed and replaced
Does a good job skimming pine needles from pool surface, and leaves settle easily into the mesh
Fits existing skimmer or leaf bag poles, saving users from buying a replacement pole
cons: Some users find the skimmer diameter a bit small
Mounting to existing extension poles can be challenging
Doesn’t grab small sticks or twigs very well
Some feel the netting mesh holes are too wide

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Design
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a good product, but after a couple months, the retaining bracket slipped over the screw head as you can see in attached photo. I would not buy this product again, nor would I recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gusto

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even remove the skimmer from the package as I could see a snag the entire length of the skimmer, and the netting size is too big to get anything other than leaves or a tree branch or maybe a June bug 😑 Useless.. returned! Pic comparing the netting size to the old plastic skimmer I was trying to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Thurau

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Design!
customer_reviews.text: All my other skimmers had plastic rims and all of them became worthless very quickly. In addition, the fatter plastic rims made it hard to get stuff close to the edge of the pool. This skimmer works like a charm. Where the plastic ones bent as I pulled them through the water, this one holds tough and enables me to efficiently clean up the pool. So far, it blows away the others I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Caomanach

customer_reviews.title: This net is pretty strong. My only problem with it is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This net is pretty strong. My only problem with it is the holes in the net. Too big. It's good for leaves and such,but for the small stuff it let's alot go right through. But I suppose I could replace the netting with something finer.
customer_reviews.author: arthur v.

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Net
customer_reviews.text: We received the net on time & are very pleased with not only the quality, but the look of the net. It cleans very well & is reasonable in price. The net is perfect, not 2 sheer but not 2 thin.....it should last for a long X. We would not hesitate to order this net again if/when we need a replacement in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Toth

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. It's not an expensive item, but there's no reason for the very poor quality. See attached pictures (brand right out of the box)
customer_reviews.author: B Mattern

customer_reviews.title: May need some repair right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after first use. The robots at the factory tightened the screws too tight and it ripped through the rubber that holds the net to the frame. I repaired it with some brass and stainless hardware I had laying around the house. Was going to return but didn't feel like finding a new box to package it in (my kids....they love boxes), driving to the UPS store, waiting for a refund, and finding a new net. There is really no reason the screws dont have washers on them.
customer_reviews.author: 6_kids_and_done_counting

customer_reviews.title: Millard Pool Leaf Skimmer Net
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is aluminum, but I feel the netting is not as sturdy as I have had in the past. Also there is one small area on the edge where they put on a piece to hold the net, it is supposed to be inserted into a grove and the one I received has a small gap on the bend. Will update if there are issues in the future. The shape and size are great, and the prongs to hold it onto the handle are adequate .
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my previous skimmer which I hated. The Millard skimmer has a small amount of slack to the mesh which gives the skimmer a small pocket to collect and trap debris. My previous skimmer had mesh that was taut, making skimming much more difficult. I never would have thought that it would matter - but it does. The Millard skimmer also seems to be of very good quality, and I'm looking forward to many pool seasons using it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: We received this product less than a week ago and the net has already broke. The netting is very cheap and not durable
customer_reviews.author: parent

customer_reviews.title: Sucks - and not in the good way.
customer_reviews.text: This skimmer blows. The net things separate too easily, it misses small bugs, it's generally light but it is super freaking shallow and doesn't hold or keep in a lot of debris. We sold it on facebook to some other idiot who can deal with that crap. We ended up buying a real net through our pool guy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cain

customer_reviews.title: Nice skimmer, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I was using this in a small, 8' pool, so did not need an extender handle. It worked quite well as is. I only returned it because the pool was defective, and I haven't been able to replace it with a decent one. Nice skimmer, and I'm sure it would work great in a larger pool with an extender pole. The mesh is very fine, so nothing is left in its wake. The mesh also has just enough give that it's easy to dump out the skimmed contents onto the ground without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: A trusted Amazon Choice - perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this late in the season but really needed a good skimmer. Already used it as the leaves are falling (even in AZ) and am very satisfied. Good size, good construction, light weight yet strong and scoops the bottom leaves very well. Also bought a Milliard brush which is equally well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Skimmer was smaller than the one I purchased at Home Depot, but that's OK because I just have an above-ground pool. Unfortunately, the holes in the netting are larger, so the smaller bits of debris do not get picked up as easily. I find that even though I was able to pick them up the first time, they slide through the holes if I continue to go after more debris. A little frustrating, but the price was right. Would I buy this again? Probably not - I think I'll spend a little more and not have to deal with the frustration of getting the smaller particles scooped up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharry Sweazey

customer_reviews.title: ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: They replaced the screws with pop rivets so to replace the mesh you have to drill them out Yet more stuff designed to be disposable - what a waste
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made better than my original pool supplier provided. Hope to be using for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Annie K

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: You would think that these pool items are actually quality tested for pool use. Apparently not. The blue on the handle actually rubs off once it gets wet in a saltwater pool. Epic disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Not fine mesh
customer_reviews.text: NOT FINE MESH. If you’re trying to skim small things out of your pool and need a fine mesh net this is not the one for you. It does appear to be well made and durable but it’s just not made with fine mesh as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kirch

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Had for one season so far but works great, I use it 2-3 times weekly because of neighbor trees & wind blowing leaves in the pool, durable, light weight, easy to use under water, great value
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good skimmer, this is a replacement for identical one I had for two years. We'll see if this deserves "Professional" moniker, previous one became a bit crooked and the netting ripped open where the net meets the handle. Does the job and at this price buying one every two to three years isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kubiaczyk

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about the skimmer net. It is 'medium' duty...not heavy duty as the rim not metal but a sturdy plastic material; but certainly not light duty/easily breakable. In short, it's worth the money. If you take care of your equipment, you don't need to spend a lot of money for a net, and this one is pretty perfect. I would prefer it be a little wider, but other than that, it is a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rberg

customer_reviews.title: Fits a standard handle
customer_reviews.text: I use this to skim my koi pond and it works great. I replaced an old, busted up skimmer. You need a handle for it and it fit the handle of the one I had perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Stonaha

customer_reviews.title: Metal frame
customer_reviews.text: This net gas a metal frame which is sturdy. Much better than our last net which had a plastic frame & broke as we were trying to remove a turtle from our pool.
customer_reviews.author: clb

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This net is perfect (for me). It’s exactly the right size, sturdy, well made, light weight, screen mesh is perfect, all the features I wanted and the price is right too! I don’t agree with any of the negative reviews. I highly recommend this net. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Works OK. Had to go back to my last net after as small particles seem to pass through this one. Seems pretty cheaply made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Works great even without a pole
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I don't have a pole and my pool would be classified more as a kiddie pool. I am able to reach the middle of my pool and skim all the leaves and debris off. It has some give to it so the leaves settle into the netting and don't just slide off. It is wide so it doesn't take me long to get everything picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary at first with its all-plastic construction but at usage, it makes skimming easier that with my old larger aluminum-frame. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: P. LaHaye

customer_reviews.title: study, standard pole attachment
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an adequate skimmer. I like how study the frame is and the small pole end that attaches fit the standard size pool equipment pole. The netting appears to be well matched to the frame. Hoping this last for a couple years...if so worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Connie  Tarsook

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I just had a pool built and they included a deep net for skimming. I wanted another one, not so deep, for small items. The Millard was perfect and does an excellent job. It rushes through the water easily and picks up the smallest of items. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl64

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This one is replacing the one I had for 4 years here in Phoenix, AZ hot summer heat. Appears to be a better quality item than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The metal frame
customer_reviews.text: I replaced it with a plastic frame skimmer that broke. This one is much sturdier. I just received this skimmer the other day and it is much sturdier than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: william schirmeister

customer_reviews.title: Good Skimmer
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than some but the quality shows. Lasts multiple years and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy skimmer.
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a new house with a pool and I broke the skimmer. I found this on Amazon and replaced it easily. It is a sturdy skimmer and I do not anticipate having to replace this one for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jbrmurray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Does not scoop well. Needs a scoop like other to get under leaves and debri on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A WELL-DESIGNED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The Milliard pool leaf skimmer is well built and should last for quite a while (given its metal rim as opposed to the plastic rim on many skimmers). The netting has an ideal screen mesh size, which lets the skimmer pass quickly through the water while the netting still collects the desired debris. It is worth the extra cost compared to lower-quality skimmer nets.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a few split and dented parts. I used a nail clipper snd file to smooth them because I didn't want to risk damage to our vinyl liner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M. Strootman

customer_reviews.title: It has extra holding clips
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, used it first day, only problem is the thingy that holds it in the pole isn't very strong came off the pole fell into the sholliw end just scooped it out.
customer_reviews.author: rjones

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these. Oldest one is two years. Hasn't been any issues with quality so far. I take out the internal clip and use stainless screws to secure it to a aluminum broomstick. 6 foot. Works better than those extension poles they sell for big bucks.
customer_reviews.author: PHL2PBI

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and over priced. At the time I purchased there was also no mention that it did not include a pole. Many pictures show it with a pole. For the price it certainly should have included one. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: zak

customer_reviews.title: Pool skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Just got this skimmer and haven't had the chance to use it yet to test its' sturdiness. I do like the fact that I could change out the screen if necessary. I'll update as the season goes along.
customer_reviews.author: jwmshp456

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It has held up fine and takes some good whacks against the edge of the hardscape to shake debris off. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JoseToner

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had in four years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leaf 🍃 skimmer money can buy for grabbing those pesky surface items! It glides through the water nicely and is light, but very durable. It also works great for picking the small bugs out of the pool before my morning swim... Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex

customer_reviews.title: Quality Net
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this regularly for over 2 years and it’s still totally in tact.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and works well picking up debris from the pool
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and works well picking up debris from the pool. It is what you would expect from a leaf skimmer. Neighbor has the same one and is also very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the size of the netting (which was too ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size of the netting (which was too large allowing the small bugs and debris to go straight through. I also wanted a net that is tight from rim to rim. This one has too much swag. I am going to try and replace the current net with material that I feel will work better by taking the frame apart. I am risking that it may not work, but hey... it isn't working to my satisfaction anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues. Bought as a replacement, quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pole skimmer
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pole skimmer. Big enough holes to make easy removal from the pool yet small enough to catch all the debris. The best skimmer net. I will always buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my moms pond works outstanding better than the original one we had . Not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it fastens to the pole. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: flowerchildsusie

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I like the aluminum frame and the fact the netting can be changed if needed. It meets every expectation of what a quality skimmer should be...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it arrived right on time! was immediately put to ...
customer_reviews.text: it arrived right on time! was immediately put to use skimming our pond so it is pristine.(house for sale) it fit the existing pole with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: gcbrit wife

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the cost. It's starting to rip from being in and out of my bucket, but I think that's my fault but the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This leaf skimmer net was just as described and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leaf skimmer I have found for the price. The mesh is a little loose compared to my original skimmer, but at half the price, I don't mind. It still works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality skimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt service. Much better quality tool than I expected and appears to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Made well. Looks like it’s going to hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My old pool skimmer had served its time and I was in need of a new one. I checked with my local pool supply company and asked for the most basic pool net they had. They quoted me $18, so I decided to go with the one off Amazon. I've used it a few times now and it's a great product for a great price. You won't be sorry after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: We had a plastic one that rotted after 2 years. This metal one seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: All good except material used for frame. Bends easily and will break soon from metal fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Works ok - my biggest complaint is that the net ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok - my biggest complaint is that the net is too tight. As a result, it doesn't pick up many bugs before you need to empty it out or risk letting them lose back into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Net came with holes in it.
customer_reviews.text: Net was delivered with 2 different holes in it and netting very loose. Very disappointed. My 18 year old net is in better shape. Kind of defeats the purpose of buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It helps me to skim the “live” bees before they drown. A good scooper
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Our old leaf skimmer gave out and I couldn't find one at the local stores. This one was delivered very quickly. It is better and deeper than our old one. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bowtie Conversions

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy net with no wiggle. Perfect for above ground pool, long enough, strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: RuthieJay

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest, but very well made! Should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Netting had a hole.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a high quality skimmer. However, the netting had a hole in it straight out of the packaging. It came sealed in plastic, so it had to of happened at the manufacturer. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jer-dog1

customer_reviews.title: Small netting that works great for small debris in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Small netting that works great for small debris in the pool. I occasionally get large quantities of gnats that get blown in during storms. Some nets have gaps which are too big; this one works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Good Pool Skimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent skimmer, although the metal rim is slightly flimsy, and bends easily. Otherwise, I have not complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to accurately scoop out debris
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, much better than my prior model at accurately catching the debris I want to scoop up. It's light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Janek

customer_reviews.title: Great skimmer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for the price but I was surprised that this was every bit as good as the one Home Depot wanted 23.00 for. Super great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal .. doesn’t bend when your trolling the surface of your pool like the plastic ones .. the metal frame seems super strong ..
customer_reviews.author: SacTownCorey

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits a standard handle. Seems solid (better than the net it replaced). If there are still 5 stars on this review, it's still working and I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Man on the Run

customer_reviews.title: Quality and workmanship below expectation
customer_reviews.text: The quality and workmanship seem to be poorer than what was available at Home Depot. Decided to return it and buy one at Home Depot although at higher price because of concern that it may not last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Kwang H. Baek

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Net!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic net! It's well built and heavy duty. It looks like you can replace the net if it tears, but I haven't tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Skimmer net
customer_reviews.text: Stronger and better made than the previous 2 we purchaser from other manufacturers. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! These are great for daily skimming of our horse troughs between bi-weekly scrubbings! Our last one of these held up great for 6 years!
customer_reviews.author: Theia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this skimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great quality skimmer...bought it to replace a cheesy plastic one that broke almost instantly. This one will last and last, and should the need arise, the netting is replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Mamagina

customer_reviews.title: Pool Leaf Skimmer - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum leaf skimmer arrived as expected and performs great - much better than the plastic skimmer I replaced. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Murchison

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Feels smooth in the water and glides very nicely. Working perfect so far.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Feels smooth in the water and glides very nicely. Working perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: JimThor

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid. Used for a few months and it has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: The nerve and frame seem to be strong. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The nerve and frame seem to be strong. I am actually using this product for our horses water tanks. Works perfectly to remove anything that begins to form on the top or their water.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, although it is not is not as durable as some pool skimmers. What more can you expect for the price?
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Wittas

customer_reviews.title: Nice skimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a nicer skimmer than the on it replaces. I think that it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The net was a replacement for a worn out one. It came in a timely manner and works fine
customer_reviews.author: Sally Riley

customer_reviews.title: Works great for surface stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy aluminum frame. Everything I expect in a good quality leaf skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: bumper

customer_reviews.title: Good well built. Check your mount first
customer_reviews.text: I thought this might screw onto our poles we use for extensions. It needs a hole to put a pin through. Constructed well and pretty strong. Should work but mounting it solid onto a pole will be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Should be fine
customer_reviews.text: The skimmer looks like it will be fine. I must comment, however, that the "neck" is shorter than my last one so it would only button at the shortest distance...was just shy of the sturdier position.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in good condition. Better then others I've used due to a larger net weave structure allowing less water resistance and ease of use. Definely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The thin frame makes this net much easier to use when scooping something from the pool bottom because it has much less resistance than those with a wider frame. And it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different netting is required...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, fine debris such as small insects sticks to netting even when dry and will not brush off so you must use the skimmer in same direction so as not to have old debris come off in your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Papa

customer_reviews.title: My old one was a decade old.
customer_reviews.text: It had one ity bity hole in the middle of the net.Going to treat it with a dab of monkey glue.
customer_reviews.author: Kupuna

customer_reviews.title: Better built than most I've use...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far! My problem with cheaper skimmers is that after some use, the plastic at the neck fatigues and breaks. I look forward to using this one for a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the leaves easily but is a little small for collecting large items ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. Cleans the leaves easily but is a little small for collecting large items that sometimes get on the pool surface.
customer_reviews.author: DClemens

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad skimmer. Came with a couple small tears in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad skimmer. Came with a couple small tears in the screen, but nothing which impacts using it.
customer_reviews.author: Writer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The strings started breaking by the third use. Had to buy a replacement from a more reputable company after the first week.
customer_reviews.author: John Therres

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. it has a round end so my hubby had to bend it to fit our extendable rod.
customer_reviews.author: Carri Grimes

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: No moving parts!! It is doing what is meant to do. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice find
customer_reviews.text: Good net for the price - just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not this one!
customer_reviews.text: Frame broke first time I used it this year, thought the metal would be stronger than plastic, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and simple does the trick. I like that the screen can actually be changed out in the future. Pretty cool. The quality is good. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Milliard Pool Leaf Skimmer Net: Professional, Heavy-Duty Pool Rake, Durable Aluminum
feature_bullets: Great for first-time pool owners or as a replacement skimmer
Heavy-duty aluminum rim and nylon netting are long-lasting and durable, but gentle on pool siding and liners
Use the skimmer by itself, or attach to a standard 1 1/4" extension pole to the handle for poolside cleaning
Enjoy a clean debris-free pool in no time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars519 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
